chapter.text: 92|7|hananim-eun geuga chugbog-eulo ganeun gil-eul swibge hayeo jusinola
92|10|hananim-eun geuga bulhaeng-eulo ga neun gil-eul swibge halini
92|11|geuga jiog-eulo hyanghal ttaeneun geu ui jaesan-i geuleul yuighage moshanila
92|14|geuleomeulo naega neohuiege gyeog lyeolhage taoleuneun buljiog-eul gyeong-goha nani
92|15|gajang bulhaenghan jadeulman-i geugos e ileuge doenila
92|17|geuleona hananimkke heonsinhaneun janeun geugos-eulobuteo je-oe doegeoneul
92|18|ideul-eun geudeul-ui jaesan-eul bachi myeo seuseuloleul sungyeolke hasa
92|19|geuga bepun eunhyee daehan bosang-eul geuui ma-eumsog-e gaj-ji anihago
92|20|ojig gajang wie gyesineun junim eul gippeuge hagoja haneun somang-eul ga jin jadeullo
92|21|ideul-eun god wanjeonhan gippeum-eul nu lige doelila
